variable.name: INVSITE
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the site (for internal use)

variable.name: INV
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the investigator (for internal use)

variable.name: GP3
variable.description: Because of my physical condition, I have trouble meeting the needs of my family
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: GF1
variable.description: I am able to work (include work at home)
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: AN6
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: ITU3
variable.description: I have to limit my social activity because of my condition
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: CNS5
variable.description: I have strength in my legs
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: MS1
variable.description: I have trouble getting around in public places
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: MS2
variable.description: I have to take my condition into account when making plans
variable.comment: FAMS - MOBILITY By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.
